title: Hellstorm
description: Life really loves to pull the rug out from under you.Who would have thought things would take this weird turn? There was me thinking everything would be by the book. Do my job as a Protector, keep Midgrove City safe. Be a good hellhound shifter.How wrong I was!There are so many pieces to this puzzle, with nowhere to slot them in. But I’ve got to keep on. Somewhere in the shadows is the truth. I just need to find the light to blast it out.There’s a storm coming…What happened to the fun, carefree days of gaming and bingeing my favourite Sci-Fi TV show?Ha! Like a hellhound’s life is ever carefree!Dream on, Draven!Hellstorm is the second volume in an Urban Fantasy series packed with action, adventure, and slow-burn MM Ménage Romance.This book is not a standalone.
author: Richard Amos
